DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Self-thoracic Spine Mobilization Improving Sleep Quality Patients Who Have Shoulder Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects chief complaint musculoskeletal pain recruit clinic Departments Internal Medicine , Family Medicine , Orthopedic Surgery . Subjects randomize either intervention control group . The intervention group receive education sleep hygiene instruction use foam roller mobilize thoracic spine rib subject go sleep . The control group receive education sleep hygiene . Valid reliable measure use assess sleep quality ( Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ) , pain ( Numeric Pain Rating Scale ) , function ( SF-36 ASES ) , well sleep diary . Measures take baseline well two week subject 's enrollment study .
